thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: An Index Fund’s Sudden Death

author: Daisy Maxey
title: An Index Fund’s Sudden Death
text:
Investors in PNC S&P 500 Index Fund (PIIAX) late last year may have expected to continue reaping gains similar to those of the steadily rising stock market. Instead, they received a hefty capital-gains payout followed by the fund’s liquidation.
Their plight illustrates the toll that redemptions can take on investors who stick with a mutual fund that others are leaving.
The...
